basic_info.description: I am Thomas, a software developer with a military and filmmaking background. I believe there are many opportunities for me to make memorable websites for companies and individuals. Invite your users into your world of imagination.

projects.title: Layoffs: The Game
projects.description: This web game will utilize a left-right decision making mechanism simulating a overworked HR manager at a big tech company. The user will be presented with a simulated graph of an employee's progress in their Perfomance Improvement Plan (PIP) and will have to make a binary descision to retain or fire the worker. The employees are either in good standing (represented by green scorecard) or in bad standing (represented by red scorecard). On the scorecard, there is a progress graph indicated if they are improving or worsening in their standing. The user will have to click right to keep or click left to fire. When the time ends, the user will be presented with how many employees they've processed correctly. They will then be able to brag to their friends about their cutthroat business acumen!

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Used JavaScript to generate random sales data and printed out a table. Also, created a layout and filled in with content.
